remarks: Scalar multiplication property of a linear operator.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Dec-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lnomul.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
lnomul.5 $e |- R = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
lnomul.6 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` W ) $.
lnomul.7 $e |- L = ( U LnOp W ) $.
lnomul $p |- ( ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. NrmCVec /\ T e. L ) /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. X ) ) -> ( T ` ( A R B ) ) = ( A S ( T ` B ) ) ) $.
